Protocols/Store.html.name: Store
Protocols/Store.html.abstract: The protocol that defines the API for plugins that store Session data.

Extensions/RouterRequest.html#/s:6Kitura.name: session
Extensions/RouterRequest.html#/s:6Kitura.abstract: The session’s state that is stored in a SessionState object.

Extensions/RouterRequest.html.name: RouterRequest
Extensions/RouterRequest.html.abstract: Extension of the RouterRequest class that provides access to the session’s state

Enums/CookieParameter.html.name: CookieParameter
Enums/CookieParameter.html.abstract: The parameters for configurating the cookies used to send the session IDs to the clients.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: reload(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Reload the session data from the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: save(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Save the session data to the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: destroy(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Delete the session data from the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: remove(key:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Remove an entry from the session data.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Retrieve an entry from the session data.

Classes/Session.html.name: Session
Classes/Session.html.abstract: A pluggable middleware for managing user sessions.

Classes/SessionState.html.name: SessionState
Classes/SessionState.html.abstract: A set of helper functions to manipulate session data.
